mapper.select: select a.* from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join dsk_obj b on a.obj_id = b.obj_id where ds_eng_name in (select distinct DS_ENG_NAME from dsk_tbl where upper(TBL_NAME) in ( select distinct upper(TABLENAME) from (select * from TABLECHANGELOG where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(UPDATETIME) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:beginDateTime) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(UPDATETIME) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:endDateTime) order by UPDATETIME desc) ) ) and a.ds_typ in (2,3,7) and a.is_use = '1' and a.db_typ = 3 and b.obj_sts <> 0

select a.*,b.db_name from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join dsk_obj b on a.obj_id = b.obj_id where a.ds_typ in (2,3,7,8) and a.is_use = '1' and a.db_typ = 3 and b.obj_sts <> 0 -- and DS_ENG_NAME in ('COMCN_BAS_INFO')

select distinct a.ds_eng_name from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join dsk_obj b on a.obj_id = b.obj_id where a.ds_typ in (2,3,7,8) and a.is_use = '1' and a.db_typ = 3 and b.obj_sts <> 0 order by ds_eng_name asc
select a.*,b.db_name from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join dsk_obj b on a.obj_id = b.obj_id where a.ds_typ in (5) and a.is_use = '1' and a.db_typ = 3 and b.obj_sts <> 0 order by ds_eng_name asc
select a.*,b.db_name from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join dsk_obj b on a.obj_id = b.obj_id where a.ds_typ in (2,3,7,8) and a.is_use = '1' and a.ref_typ in (200) and a.db_typ = 3 and b.obj_sts <> 0

select a.*,b.trig_flag,b.trig_time,c.db_name from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join DSK_DATA_SOUR_sup b on a.id = b.orig_id inner join dsk_obj c on a.obj_id = c.obj_id where a.ds_typ in (2,3,7,8) and a.is_use = '1' and b.trig_flag = 1 and a.db_typ = 3 and c.obj_sts <> 0

select distinct a.tbl_name from dsk_tbl a inner join dsk_data_sour_def b on a.ds_eng_name = b.ds_eng_name inner join dsk_obj c on b.obj_id = c.obj_id where b.ds_typ in (2, 3, 7,8) and b.is_use = '1' and b.db_typ = 3 and c.obj_sts <> 0 order by a.tbl_name

select (select max(max_updtime) from stats_table_maxupdtime m where m.table_name = a.tbl_name and c.db_name is null) max_updtime, a.tbl_name,b.*,c.db_name from dsk_tbl a inner join dsk_data_sour_def b on a.ds_eng_name = b.ds_eng_name inner join dsk_obj c on b.obj_id = c.obj_id where b.ds_typ in (2, 3, 7,8) and b.is_use = '1' and b.db_typ = 1 and c.obj_sts <> 0 order by a.tbl_name,b.ds_eng_name

select a.* from dsk_data_sour_def a inner join dsk_obj b on a.obj_id = b.obj_id where ds_eng_name in (select distinct ds_eng_name from (select a.* from dsk_tbl a inner join dsk_obj c on c.obj_eng_name = a.ds_eng_name inner join dsk_obj_prop b on c.obj_id = b.obj_id where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.upd_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:beginDateTime) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.upd_time) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:endDateTime) ) y UNION select distinct ds_eng_name from dsk_data_sour_def z where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(z.upd_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:beginDateTime) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(z.upd_time) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:endDateTime) UNION select distinct ds_eng_name from (select a.* from dsk_tbl a inner join dsk_obj c on c.obj_sour = a.ds_eng_name inner join DSK_OBJ_INDEX b on c.obj_id = b.obj_id where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.upd_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:beginDateTime) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.upd_time) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(:endDateTime) ) x ) and a.ds_typ in (2,3,7,8) and a.is_use = '1' and a.db_typ = 3 and b.obj_sts <> 0
select * from DSK_OBJ_INDEX where obj_id = :obj_id order by INDEX_NAME asc
select cst_desc,CST_NUM from bas_cst_info where cst_typ = 10004
